title: Telecom tower
creator_credit: Christina Hunniford, Telecom Australia and CTC TV
brief_description: A documentary film which tells something of the project and the services which Telecommunications Tower, Black Mountain, Canberra, provides for all Australians. Also highlights various points of interest in Canberra.
